item.title: Moving Back to Github Pages
item.description: In 2023, I’m going back to the simplicity of static webpages.
item.content:encoded:
After a few days of experimentation, I have officially relaunched my Blog on Github Pages. I often contemplate which platform to use for recording my thoughts, or what format to become familiar with, but nothing beats the authenticity of continuous documentation.

Having a notebook that I can control not only allows me to express my feelings but also enables me to record the bits and pieces of my learning journey. Hugo is truly an amazing tool; the overall experience is much better than it was with Hexo several years ago. In the upcoming posts, I will share some simple records on how to configure it on your own.
